Author: James R Tabor
Summary: Wanted to share a quick post with a script I seem to use all the time to get a spreadsheet with all the available VM sizes available for use in each region.SYNOPSISThis script loads Azure VMs into a Sharepoint Online list.DESCRIPTIONRetrieves a list of all Azure locations
Title: Export Available Azure VM Sizes for all locations
UserTags: Microsoft Azure, Windows Azure Virtual Machines
